scripts.build:min-css: if [ "$CI" = "true" ]; then npx sass --load-path=node_modules --style=compressed src/assets/scss/:src/assets/css/; else npx sass --load-path=node_modules --style=compressed --watch src/assets/scss/:src/assets/css/; fi
scripts.build:js: if [ "$CI" = "true" ]; then npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.json; else npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.json --watch; fi
scripts.build: npm install && npm run clean && npm-run-all --parallel build:* optimize:svg
